content: Nonostante Trang continui a dire di amarlo, Spenser non pu√≤ fare a meno di aver paura che lei smetta di volergli bene.
translations: eng:Even though Trang continued to say that she loved him, Spenser couldn't do anything but fear that she would stop caring
